mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hoy, J. T. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hoy, J. T.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 16 1862. By Telegraph from Parkersburg A messenger came this morning from Col Lightburn at Ravenswood saying Bill Jackson is marching on Parkersburg by webbs mills. Loring operating on Elk River towards Gallipolis O & Floyd gone down big Kanawha to Gallipolis. Had a fight at Charleston JT Hoy Lieut Col Comdg Post 41q133pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hoy, J. T.
Parkersburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
